body_html: @jpmerc, could you run your command line through sudo, similar to you C++ examples? I wonder whether it is the root access that is making the difference. The initialization logic should be the same between C++ and Python clients.

body: @jpmerc, could you run your command line through sudo, similar to you C++ examples? I wonder whether it is the root access that is making the difference. The initialization logic should be the same between C++ and Python clients.
